segments.text: Wow , there are so many lanterns to appreciate . Now , I can see why it's called the Lantern Festival . It deserves its name .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . People always enjoy the lighted lanterns and the gala performances .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are they doing over there ? People keep on gathering there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you notice the characters on the lanterns ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . But you know that I can't read any Chinese characters . What do they say ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They are puzzles . It's a tradition to solve the puzzles on the lanterns during the Lantern Festival .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very interesting . But I'm afraid we'd better do something else . Hey , look ! There is a huge lantern there . Let's get close to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's really eye-catching . It's the biggest dragon lantern I've ever seen in all my life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Then I'm really lucky . Oh , it's spewing fireworks from its huge mouth .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very impressive . It's made of glass which makes it even brighter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There are many Chinese characters on its body , too . What are they about ? Puzzles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me have a look . Oh , no . They are Chinese poems which describe this happy scene .
segments.speaker: S2
